title: You’d Better Start Preparing for Post-Election Chaos (Ep 1331)
description:
In this episode, I address the game changing Republican National Convention. The GOP has masterfully staged this event and a couple of moments really stood out. I also address a shock poll showing that the liberal street chaos is destroying the Democrats’ approval numbers. 

News Picks:


Violence erupts in Kenosha as rioters are met by armed civilians. 

Hillary Clinton is actively promoting post-election chaos. 


Nick Sandmann gets the last word. And it’s glorious.

Lifelong Democrat calls in to CSpan and shocks the audience. 

Shock poll shows Trump besting Biden among independents.

The polls are closing in swing states. Trump is moving up.
